Room.Name: Regalia Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Regalia Way between the Convent and the Markets.
Room.LongDescription: On the east side of the road, you can see Maria's Market, a small grocery store which caters to the lower, working classes, providing meat and vegetables from the various small farms both inside and outside of Oceancrest. The Convent is located on the western side of the road.
